items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long, Casual Dress
items.body: This dress is really lovely! I didn’t realize when I ordered it that it came with pockets — as convenient as pockets are, I find they normally make a dress look a bit awkward but that’s not the case here. The pockets are functional yet they don’t cause the fabric to look bunched up on the sides, they’re not really noticeable at all which I love! The color is a little bit more pale in person than how it’s shown but I adore the color of the actual dress so for me it’s not a complaint, but just know that for the green one at least, the shade of the color is just a bit off. I love that this dress is nice enough to wear to work as a teacher with just a little denim jacket tossed over my shoulders, but is still so soft, feels very casual and isn’t too warm for our hot afternoons. Size / fit info: I’m 5’7” - 167 lbs - 36B - usually wear size Large / 12 in dresses. I ordered this in my regular size large and the fit is fantastic! It falls below my knees just where I’d expected it to and it’s incredibly flattering. It minimizes my waist and helps me feel sufficiently covered up for work but also like I look good and am wearing something cute. I’d definitely stick to your regular size for this one. Hope this helps! Read more
items.author: Mother of LEGOs

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great summer dress!
items.body: I am very happy with this dress. The fit is great, true size. I like the way the gathering at the top allows for a fitted look with a ton of stretch to accommodate different body shapes and sizes. The cut is very forgiving, which is great for those of us who are busty, but then like the fabric to flow away from our stomach areas while avoiding the “circus tent” silhouette. The stretchy top accentuates my waist well at the narrowest point before flaring out. The neckline and arm holes are cut well to be flattering, and keep a bra hidden. The pockets are a great added bonus and they are placed nicely so that they don’t affect the silhouette of the dress. The color is as expected a nice deep green for the version that I ordered. I washed the dress in cold water and hung to dry with good effect. I was particularly impressed with the fact that there were hardly any wrinkles. This would be a great dress to pack for a vacation. I look forward to wearing it a lot once the warm weather comes back. It would even be appropriate for a casual office setting with the addition of a little sweater! Read more
items.author: Sarah L

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks
items.body: I returned. mine because it just didn't look good on me. Nothing wrong with the dress - Read more
items.author: Debbie Mcdowell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great summer dress
items.body: I wasn't sure I'd like this dress, because smocking seems to be rather hit-or-miss. But the smocking on this dress helps the bodice fit very attractively and still be surprisingly comfortable. The fit draws the eye to my bust and narrow waist, without going too low at the neckline. It even has the high armsceyes that I prefer, because I know my bra won't show. The fit is true-to-size. I love dresses with pockets, especially if those pockets are so well hidden that I don't notice them. These pockets are practically invisible as long as they're empty, though they're big enough to hold my phone. In other words, they're perfect. The fabric used throughout this dress is a soft, flowy tee-shirt material that packs easily and looks great even if you're pulling it out of a suitcase. You can dress it up with some nice heels or go casual with some flat sandals. It's a perfect summer dress, though you can stretch it into spring and fall with a jacket and maybe some boots. Too bad it's winter right now, or I'd be wearing it. Read more
items.author: Gracious

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Summer Dress
items.body: This AUSELILY dress is a great summer dress. The material is soft and lightweight. I sized up on this dress from my usual large to an extra large, as I did not want the bust too be too tight with the smocking "pulled". I'm glad I did- it fits perfectly and the smocking across the bust looks great. I would actually recommend sizing up because the whole dress seems to fit really well. The coverage on the shoulders is good and the length is mid-calf (I'm 5'7"). This dress washed well on cold and I hung it to dry with no wrinkling. It would make a good vacation dress since it is packable and doesn't wrinkle. The pattern is well-done with bright colors and no blobby or smeared spots. I 'm really pleased with this dress and glad I ordered it. Read more
items.author: BettyB

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Top Bit is Itchy
items.body: Honestly was a huge fan of the dress. I likes the way the material felt. It had pockets which is always a plus. The color looked amazing and was one of the most comfortable dresses I've every really worn. However that being said the top was really scratchy. Like itchy almost and i genuinely wouldn't feel comfortable for wearing it for too long. Its good as a night out dress but not something you'd wear all day. In order for it to be comfortable in that way is have to wear a tank top or something underneath at least the top scrunchy bit. The dress fir nicely and fit a little bit more snug after a wash and dry. With the perfect pair of shoes its honestly an amazing dress just not something to wear in the long term. Read more
items.author: A Huge Disappointment

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Comfortable, and Flattering Sundress
items.body: I purchased this sundress in Colorful Plantain Leaf in a size XXL, and it exceeded my expectations in every way. The color is stunning—vibrant, eye-catching, and even more attractive in person. It immediately stands out as a perfect warm-weather piece. For reference, I typically wear a size 16/18, and the fit is spot-on. The gathered bodice hugs the body comfortably without feeling tight or restrictive, creating a flattering silhouette. The dress drapes beautifully and falls naturally, giving it an effortlessly stylish look. The fabric is soft, breathable, and comfortable against the skin—ideal for all-day wear. A thoughtful bonus is the two hip pockets, which are discreet but incredibly convenient. This dress is versatile enough to pair with sandals for a casual outing or heels for a more polished look. It truly checks all the boxes for me: style, comfort, color, and fit. I’m already planning to purchase more in other colors. Read more
items.author: Rhu

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Floral, Black, Camel, White Floral, Olive Green Leaves, Selva Leaf Map, Orange, Blue White Floral, White Willow Leaf, Yellow Floral, Black Apricot Leaf, Black Gold Leaf, Colorful Plantain Leaf, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
